dcterms:creator: J. S. Garofolo
L. F. Lamel
W. M. Fisher
J. G. Fiscus
D. S. Pallett
N. L. Dahlgren
dcterms:description: The TIMIT Acoustic-Phonetic Continuous Speech Corpus is used for training the Wavenet model to predict the PESQ score of clean and degraded audio signals.
dcterms:title: TIMIT Acoustic-Phonetic Continuous Speech Corpus

dcterms:creator: A. W. Rix
J. G. Beerends
M. P. Hollier
A. P. Hekstra
dcterms:description: PESQ is a standard for automated assessment of voice quality of speech, aiming to correlate closely with subjective quality scores.
dcterms:title: PESQ (Perceptual Evaluation of Speech Quality)

dcterms:creator: John G. Beerends
Christian Schmidmer
Jens Berger
Matthias Obermann
Raphael Ullmann
Joachim Pomy
Michael Keyhl
dcterms:description: POLQA is the third generation ITU-T standard for end-to-end speech quality measurement, providing a methodology for assessing speech quality.
dcterms:title: POLQA (Perceptual Objective Listening Quality Assessment)

dcterms:creator: Nike
dcterms:description: Speech Spectrum Shaped Noise is generated using MATLAB to create noise with a spectrum similar to that of the original speech corpus.
dcterms:title: Speech Spectrum Shaped Noise
